executable.title: DWModeling
executable.description: Modeling of quantitative parameters from Diffusion Weighted MRI
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by NIH grants R01 CA160902 (PI Maier) and U24 CA180918 (PIs Kikinis/Fedorov).

image.name: imageName
image.label: Input image
image.description: Input DWI MRI trace multivolume image

string-enumeration.name: modelName
string-enumeration.label: Model
string-enumeration.description: Select the mathematical model used to fit the data

image.name: maskName
image.label: Input mask
image.description: Input mask. Optional; if not specified, fitting will be done at all voxels.

integer-vector.name: bValuesToInclude
integer-vector.label: B-values to include
integer-vector.description: List of integers corresponding to the b-values that should be included in fitting data. Note that only one of the two lists (inlusion or exclusion) should be populated, or both can be empty, in which case all b-values will be used. Optional; if not defined, all b-values will be used.

integer-vector.name: bValuesToExclude
integer-vector.label: B-values to exclude
integer-vector.description: List of integers corresponding to the b-values that should be excluded from fitting data. Note that only one of the two lists (inlusion or exclusion) should be populated, or both can be empty, in which case all b-values will be used. Optional; if not defined, all b-values will be used.

image.name: fittedVolumeFileName
image.label: Fitted volume
image.description: Output volume containing the values of the fitted function

image.name: rsqrVolumeFileName
image.label: R^2 quality of fit volume
image.description: Output volume containing the R^2 measure of the quality of fit. This measure is calculated only for the b-values used in the fitting process.

image.name: ssdFittedVolumeFileName
image.label: SSD for the fitted b-values
image.description: Volume with the pixel-wise sum of squared differences (SSD) map that takes into consideration only those b-values that were used in the fitting process

image.name: ssdVolumeFileName
image.label: SSD for all b-values
image.description: Volume with the pixel-wise sum of squared differences (SSD) map that takes into consideration all b-values. Note that this map will be identical to the previous one if the fitting procedure utilized all b-values

image.name: csFittedVolumeFileName
image.label: Chi squared for the fitted b-values
image.description: Volume with the pixel-wise chi squared map that takes into consideration only those b-values that were used in the fitting process

image.name: csVolumeFileName
image.label: Chi squared for all b-values
image.description: Volume with the pixel-wise pixel-wise chi squared map that takes into consideration all b-values. Note that this map will be identical to the previous one if the fitting procedure utilized all b-values

image.name: adcMapFileName
image.label: MonoExp diffusion map
image.description: Diffusion coefficient map of the mono-exponential model

image.name: slowDiffMapFileName
image.label: Slow diffusion map
image.description: Slow diffusion coefficient map of the bi-exponential model

image.name: fastDiffMapFileName
image.label: Fast diffusion map
image.description: Fast diffusion coefficient map of the bi-exponential model

image.name: fastDiffFractionMapFileName
image.label: Fast diffusion fraction map
image.description: Fast diffusion fraction map of the bi-exponential model

image.name: kurtosisDiffMapFileName
image.label: Kurtosis diffusion map
image.description: Diffusion coefficient map of the kurtosis model

image.name: thetaMapFileName
image.label: Theta parameter map
image.description: Theta parameter of the gamma model

image.name: kMapFileName
image.label: k map
image.description: k map of the gamma model

image.name: modeMapFileName
image.label: Mode map
image.description: Mode map of the gamma model ( (k-1)*theta )

float-vector.name: monoExpInitParameters
float-vector.label: Mono-exponential model
float-vector.description: List of initial model parameters in the following format (all numbers are floating point):initialScale,initialADC

float-vector.name: biExpInitParameters
float-vector.label: Bi-exponential model
float-vector.description: List of initial model parameters in the following format (all numbers are floating point):initialScale,initialFastDiffusionFraction,initialSlowDiffusionCoefficient,initialFastDiffusionCoefficient

float-vector.name: kurtosisInitParameters
float-vector.label: Kurtosis model
float-vector.description: List of initial model parameters in the following format (all numbers are floating point):initialScale,initialKurtosis,initialKurtosisDiffusion

float-vector.name: stretchedExpInitParameters
float-vector.label: Stretched exponential model parameters
float-vector.description: List of initial model parameters in the following format (all numbers are floating point):initialScale,initialDDC,initialAlpha

float-vector.name: gammaInitParameters
float-vector.label: Gamma model
float-vector.description: List of initial model parameters in the following format (all numbers are floating point):initialScale,initialK,initialTheta
